channel.title: About the Validator Introductions category
channel.description:
Dedicated Validator Introduction category - please read the guidelines before creating a post.
You must be a member of the Registered Validators group to be able to post in this category. To request access to the group, go to https://radixtalk.com/g/registered_validator and provide the Validator Address (rv1...) of your node.
